attributes.action: Give university students a refund for the 2020/21 academic year
attributes.additional_details: During these tough times university students all across the country have felt left out, forgotten, and pushed aside. We feel as if the government haven’t done enough to help and support us. On top of dealing with a pandemic some students have had to stay away from home and their families and even spend Christmas by themselves. Also, online teaching is not enough for the price that we pay. £9250 to sit in a room and be expected to produce the same quality of work is unacceptable and impossible.
attributes.background: Give refunds or at least some form of discount from student fees. We have not received the level of education that we are paying for so deserve compensation, or at least some form of support from our government.

rejection.details:
Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953
